description: Numbers that are congruent to {1, 2, 4, 6} mod 8.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1, 0, 0, 1, -1).
maple: A047411 := proc(n) if n <= 4 then op(n,[1,2,4,6]) ; else procname(n-4)+8 ; end if; end proc: seq(A047411(n),n=1..100) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 11 2010
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
